casebody.data:
Charles W. Durant, Jr., Respondent, v. William P. Abendroth, Appellant. Decided January 4, 1886. Appeal from order denying motion to set aside judgment entered on verdict. William H. Arnoux, for appellant, and Carlisle Norwood, Jr., for respondent.

Sedgwick, Oh. J., Van Vorst and Freedman, JJ., sitting.

Opinion

per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with $10 costs, &c.
